org.gbif.registry.guice

Class TestRegistryWsServletListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.servlet.GuiceServletContextListener
      • org.gbif.ws.server.guice.GbifServletListener
        • org.gbif.registry.guice.TestRegistryWsServletListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public class TestRegistryWsServletListener
extends org.gbif.ws.server.guice.GbifServletListener
    The Registry WS module for testing in Grizzly. This is the same as the production listener except that:
    1. The registry-test.properties file is used
    2. A life-cycle event monitor registers the SOLR server and Updater for JVM wide interaction
